text: Hey John, I've been thinking about Emily a lot lately and I just wanted to check in. Is there anything I can do to help out? Maybe we can arrange a dinner this week?
John, I heard Emily's been under a lot of stress. If there's anything I can do, please let me know.
Just wanted to say hi and see how you both are doing. Hope everything's okay!
I'm planning a small get-together next month. Hope you and Emily can make it!
